1265520.name: Forbidden Z
1265520.description:
The game is available till April 9th! So, happy shooting and thanks for helping us testing cloud server!
--
Forbidden Z is a local-multiplayer VR horror shooter made for LBE (Location-based Entertainment) back in early 2017. The game has been distributed across the Asia since mid-2017 when LBE VR just started to hit the market.

Combat: Use the gun to shoot down all skulls flying toward you, don't let any of these get close to you.
Skull, lots of flying skulls: Forbidden Z provides players a creepy environment that you don't know when enemies will attack. Stand tight.
Story: Co-op with your friends to beat down the boss, your are in an abandoned town where has no way to get out, fight to the end is your only choice.

Why put a LBE VR game back online?
For server testing. The team is now working on a new title Quantaar, an online multiplayer VR fighting game. This is the first time we create a game using cloud server. With little experience on this, we decide to put our previous game for testing!

Who's PumpkinVR? Pumpkin Studio?
Pumpkin VR is the new face of Pumpkin Studio. We are an indie game studio who loves games and creates games. The team has created 3 LBE VR titles since 2017 and now developing our first online VR game!

繁体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
